title: The Nests of Netherfield
description: A show about the building of desire, the longing, the passion! Lord Wilkshire is betrothed to Lady Trottington, but has eyes for Lady Netherfield. All are anxious for Countess Hennypeatherâ€™s approaching summer equinox gala.
quote: Lady Netherfield, I find you delightfully foolish.
altHero: two anthropomorphic birds dressed in Regency era English clothing
alt1: the male bird is courting the female
alt2: the two chat under a tree
alt3: a wide shot of the countryside filled with nests
alt4: the two birds sharing an innocent kiss
